troubleshooting.title: UrlChooser doesn't shows a prompt to the user that asks for the URL in Web Author

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: The UrlChooser feature in Web Author fails to display a prompt asking the user to input a URL.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Some editing tasks require the user to link several resources. For example, when inserting an image, the user must provide the URL of that image. The same scenario applies for links between XML document and DITA conrefs.

remedy.title: Solution
